properties.comment: fill options as follow arg1/arg2/arg3: - arg1 = option name etheir message to display or key to message source to message source properties file. - arg2 = option icon icon to display or key to icon message source - arg3 = option href either the link to the wished page or action or key to message source properties file. -arg4 = position in menu bar -arg5 = security levelto be greater or equals to, in order to get it displayed i.e if an option is a level security of 2 only account with a level security at 2,3,4,... can acces to it
